about_the_game:
Courier of the Crypts: Original Soundtrack by Zdravko Djordjević.
Soundtrack consists of 38 pieces which shows how rich is the game in a form of music and ambient.

Music track list: 🎹
  • Pony Delivery Service
  • Into the Forest
  • Reservoir Battle
  • Enchanted Library
  • Monks and Warlocks
  • Shattering Halls
  • Boat Ride
  • Queen Battle
  • Fire Boss
  • Fire Boss Battle
  • Foul Tree Horror
  • Abbot - Part 1
  • Abbot - Part 2
  • The Courier

Soundscape track list:🎼
  • Nightmare
  • The Morning
  • Crypt Entrance
  • Into the Darkness
  • Myth the Spiders
  • Reservoir
  • Reservoir Sewers
  • Crypt Sewers
  • Jail Cells
  • Enchanted Library
  • The Cathedral
  • The Path You Take
  • Shattering Halls
  • Queen Lair
  • Forgotten Crypts
  • The Mines
  • Lost Caverns
  • The Path
  • River of Life
  • River of Life Alternative
  • Fire Sanctum
  • The Wall
  • Dark Haven
  • Back to Marble HAlls
